subject: Collaboration proposal
description_text:
Hi,

I’m Leo, a cinematographer based in Sydney, Australia. I’m also a simrace
creator and wanted to reach out to discuss a potential collaboration.

My main Instagram account has 39.6K followers, and I’ve worked with brands
such as GoPro, DJI and Insta360, with videos reaching over 3M views.

I also run a dedicated sim racing account. While it’s still new, many
videos including regular collaborations with Moza and Box one racing have
gone viral, reaching +1M views and 3.1M engagement.

I’ve attached a few different styles of my content below to get a better
idea.

https://www.instagram.com/reel/DEmxgkDTb97/?igsh=MXNkNTQ2eDk0amhtbg==

https://www.instagram.com/reel/DEpZuQiSQMi/?igsh=ZDNueGRiYWp3NXlm

https://www.instagram.com/reel/DMg2OjvTdrD/?igsh=MXJzemd0b2YyaGZyMQ==

https://www.instagram.com/reel/DEUq1lFT-Q3/?igsh=cTl4c3QxbGc0YmJr

https://www.instagram.com/reel/DPTvtpoDNhc/?igsh=NGU2dzkza21xcHB2

Let me know if that’s something you’d be interested in!

Kind regards,
Leo

conversations.body_text: Hi Leo Matis,  Thanks for contacting. We will discuss with our team.
